title: NFL Draft Stock Watch: QB Edition | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
The guys discuss the teams that need a home run draft to be a real playoff contender in the 2019 season (0:40), before draft guru Danny Kelly joins the program to provide a stock watch of the top QB prospects in the 2019 NFL draft (41:30).
Hosts: Robert Mays and Kevin Clark
Guest: Danny Kelly

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
